verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaaru aayana thattu choodagane vaariki velugu kaligenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Krupaa satya sampoornudagu prabhuvu kaapaadunu manala prati shodhana nundi choopinchu thana mahima nityamu manaku staapinchunu manalanu thana raajyamugaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kanu gontivaa neevu devuni mahima thana kumaarudaina Yesu prabhuvulo thana prajalanu vidipimpa kristesu thanayundai ihamuna janminchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Antya dinambu vachchu chundenu choodu chintinchedaru paapulandarilalo chintinchuchu nede pashchaataapamutho raa vintha rakshananu pondi aanandintuvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa thejassu aayana shakhtito mahimatho mandiramu nindi yundenu mahaa mahuni paadamula nede vedina mahimaanandamu pondi santasintuvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristu Yesu prajalaku ee bhuvini neethi sooryudu udayinchunu mendugaa athani rekkalu aarogyamunitchunu nityamu santosha gaanamu cheturu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshimpa badina prabhuni janamaa rakshkudesuni swakeeya dhanamaa rakhtamutho konnatti kristu sanghamaa mukhti daatanu Shlaaghinchi koniyaadumu{/lang-eng}
